## PromptHelper.click() method

Creates a prompt that resolves when the player clicks on the given `GameObject`<!-- -->. An accompanying message must be provided in `options.message` that will be displayed to the prompted player. When resolved, the clicked object will be returned.

**Signature:**

```typescript
click<TObject extends GameObject>(object: TObject, options: IObjectClickOptions): Promise<TObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | TObject | <code>GameObject</code> to be clicked. |
|  options | [IObjectClickOptions](./bge-core.iobjectclickoptions.md) | Options to configure the prompt, including the <code>message</code> text. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;TObject&gt;

A promise that resolves to the clicked object.
